Text.Page:
Killian's given the argons the location of our eggs. If we cooperate, he says they won't be harmed, but how can we trust him?

An argon iknephar called Kezelran watches the eggs magically. If you kill him, you could recover some of the eggs and bring them back.

Don't let the argons take our hatchlings!

Sikander bless you! You've saved the future of the sikandaris.

I know well that your people suffered at the hands of the heretics. That makes this gift all the more meaningful. Thank you.
We mustn't let the argons steal our eggs! There's no telling what horrors they'd inflict on our children.
